channel.title: Hp bar glitch [Galkons Refactored]
channel.description:
Would anyone know how to fix this problem? I'm assuming it's in client.java, correct me if I'm wrong.
[IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/clienterror.png[/img]
Full health and the bar is only about 3/4 of the way full.

item.title: Hp bar glitch [Galkons Refactored]
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:8, topic:440582”][quote author=gtree01 link=topic=543262.msg3981543#msg3981543 date=1335321366]
Nice did that code/pointer more or less help? So how did you get the xp gains to show up and squeal of fortune? Also how excatly did you get a basic 704 on there? lol
[/quote]

Yea it helped, I think I have a general area of where the problem is. It’s my xp counter, trying to make it look like RS’s minus a few features. And my Squeal of Fortune is almost fully working, I just need to get the wheel to spin.[/quote]

Very nice. I love the server dude. If I wasn’t working on a bug infested insidiaX I would go and play on your server. <3 It looks fantastic and the best of luck dude. Also a quick question how did you decompile/unzip a 704 cache? Isn’t anything above 508+ packed?

Read full topic

item.title: Hp bar glitch [Galkons Refactored]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

gtree01:

Nice did that code/pointer more or less help? So how did you get the xp gains to show up and squeal of fortune? Also how excatly did you get a basic 704 on there? lol

Yea it helped, I think I have a general area of where the problem is. It’s my xp counter, trying to make it look like RS’s minus a few features. And my Squeal of Fortune is almost fully working, I just need to get the wheel to spin.

Read full topic

item.title: Hp bar glitch [Galkons Refactored]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I consider it loading somewhat 704. I have the latest RS interfaces, newest armors up to steel which was 704. And I’m currently trying to update everything else.

Check out my post on rune-serber.
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/graphics/390044-317-699-gameframe-interfaces.html

item.title: Hp bar glitch [Galkons Refactored]
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

Ah cool. As am I. If you don’t mind my asking how did you get a 317 to be 704? But OT: It should be something in player.java. I looked in there on line 2339 or if you have heavily edited it and using a seperate client it is located in private void updateEntities()

Read full topic

Off Topic: What source is that?[/quote]
